topic.title: War with Iran
topic.body: It looks like the handlers of the American government are pushing their most loyal servant closer and closer to war with Iran. Do you think it will actually happen? I like to read Abdel Bari Atwan's analysis of the situation: https://bariatwan.com/english/deception-or-confusion/ as a good quick overview.

1559682182_17AMQVbBa12XB3xFWKDnP2dCEx92T.body:
> [bananon](#comment_18_1HEBittLV8ADkGMhNehgZKsciCokp1RhUW): Reply
I think this green new deal bullshit is horribly overblown by both sides of the debate. AOC is just a careerist who loves to be in the spotlight. If you read her actual proposal (https://www.congress.gov/116/bills/hres109/BILLS-116hres109ih.pdf) you'll find it isn't anything more than empty posturing. It should neither enrage those foolish enough to believe climate change is not a threat nor be a source of assurance those who believe it is.

1560227102_1D7aG9GPhaCuEEiGRQpUZGZkMQVEG.body:
I don't believe that profit is a serious motivator for the Americans. It seems to me they really exist solely to die for Israel. I'm sure Iran would have gladly played nice in the interantional economy if America had kept up it's end of the nuclear deal. This would have allowed america to accomplish it's strategic interest, stable oil output, with lower troop commitment and simultaneously freed up soldiers to use to threaten China. I don't advocate for aggression either but that seems to me to be something that is legitimately in the interest of the US. War with Iran seems to only be in the interest of Israel.
